blogs.title: Why React Virtual DOM is So Slow and the Cost of Maintaining 2 Virtual DOMs
blogs.summary: Exploring why React's virtual DOM can be inefficient and the hidden costs of managing two virtual DOMs.
blogs.text: Managing 2 virtual Doms instances could be harmfull for future development of larger applications
